ComicInfo.Title: The Night of Gaming Dangerously; Taking the Point; Then Came Cody; Takin' No Flak
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Night of Gaming Dangerously: When the Black Hand Gaming Society decides to game at a local bar some of the bar customers think they are planning a bank robbery.
Taking the Point: Sara discovers that gaming with her boyfriend's group is very different than her old group.
Then Came Cody: Cody Winkle joins the group for a gaming session to replace Sarah.
Takin' No Flak: Nitro tells Weird Pete that one of the original Black Hand gamers is back in town.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:17:10. [CVDB181794] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-14 06:56:55. [Issue ID 89655]

ComicInfo.Teams: The Knights of the Dinner Table,Black Hand Gaming Society,Troy's Boys
